Sep 10, 2002

China admits ‘blood stations’ caused steep rise in Aids

> “Thousands of Chinese peasants who sold their blood to government-sponsored "blood stations" have contracted HIV-Aids, health officials have finally admitted in a secret report from the worst-affected province.” Guardian Unlimited
